item.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate DLC character Alopex now available alongside free update
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Smartphone
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

New rooms, arcade challenges, and gameplay features.

Super Evil Megacorp has released Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate downloadable content character Alopex for XXX, as well as a free update that adds new rooms, arcade challenges, and gameplay features.

Here are the details:

  • New Playable Character: Alopex (Paid Downloadable Content) – Our mutant arctic fox brings all her ninja assassin powers to the brawl. She swings her sickle-like kama around her, slicing foes with ease. She tosses kunai at close range to deal a major blast of damage. And the best part– she can briefly become invulnerable while targeting multiple enemies in rapid succession. Ninja powers that modify shuriken also affect her kunai, so try her out with the Ninja, Flame, and Water Powers for major impact.
  • Five Artifacts (Paid Downloadable Content) – Play with five Artifacts that can modify your run in interesting ways:
    • Polar Bear Netsuke – Every 10 seconds, Final Strike will throw out a line of flames. Cooldown is halved under half health.
    • The Maltese Hamster – Your Tool charges slower, but deals extra Damage.
    • Channel Six Mini Camera – Your Special charges slower, but deals extra damage.
    • Hot Cocoa (with Marshmallows) – You have -1 dash. When you dash, gain a burst of movement speed.
    • Buddy the Wraith – You have an allied Utrom Wraith, which levels up and evolves over a run
  • Four Pepper Challenges in Arcade Mode (Free) – Think you have mastered the Arcade Mode? Take a bite on an extra dose of difficulty with our new four Pepper runs. They are spicy hot! These challenges kick off with hexes already applied– do you have what it takes to overcome them?
  • Ninja Ranks (Free) – Show your skills with pride with our new prestige system. Increase your badge prestige and rep by finishing more runs.
  • New Combat Rooms (Free) – Many new combat rooms are available in Sewers, Docks, Streets, and Rooftops within the main campaign.
  • Additional balancing and quality of life improvements.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

DLC Character Alopex Trailer
